name: condition-api
description: /**  * DIAGNOSTICS  * dependencies:loader, preprequisites, persistence, api, tracking  * call swogo - performs diagnostic on connection to swogo API server  * show error logs - prints swogo error logs  * show full logs - prints swogo full logs  * show bundles - prints a map of the bundles in console in 2D  * prerequisites - prints map of prerequisites and highlights bronek or missing parts. If present display value (skus, pageID, etc)  */
